titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: 1819, Jan. 1. F. Malthus, p. 4. Hume on Populousness, p. 24. Dine at S Beresford’s , w. 3 Snows, M J, S P & W .

2. Sa. Malthus, p. 6. Ogilvie , Lubé & mrs Dixon, w. Darby, call:
Booth dines.

Jan. 3. Su. Malthus, çala. Hume, p. 46. Call on La. C L ; adv. Greek Physician & mrs Masters
: Rosser sups.

4. M. Malthus, p. 9. Tate & N G call: call on
Sir R Phillips (Leicester Square) ; adv. Monk & Edmunds
.

5. Tu. Malthus, p. 12. N G & K Colnet dine: theatre, Flodden Field.
2 nights .

6. W. Malthus, p. 15. Write to John Campbell, Emigrant-dealer . Ogilvie calls: call on Sherwood
:
Rodd’s
.

7. Th. Malthus, çala. Write to Livorno
. Fearon, America, çala. Theatre, 3/[4?] Winter’s Tale: Coleridge, Hamlet; adv. Ogilvie
: Hazlit sups.
8. F. Malthus, 3 pp. Fearon, çala. Washington Irving calls: T & Harwood Ht dine.
9. Sa. Malthus, 3 1/2 pp. Fearon, çala. Hazlit & Botwrt call.

Jan. 10. Su. Malthus, 1 page. Rigby of Holkham, çala: Fearon, çala. Call on Perry (adv. O’Meara ), &
Aspinwal ; adv. Blakes & Goodrich
.

11. M. Malthus, 4 1/2 pp. R Taylor & Ogilvie n call: Kenny dines; adv. L K
:
Rodd’s
. W to Tate’s .
12. Tu. Malthus, 1 page. Dine at Booth’s , w. Curtises, Gilchrist, 4 Baxters, M J, S P & W .

13. W. Malthus, Checks, p. 3, 4, 5. Mrs Beresford, 3 Snows & J Taylor dine.
Wolcot dies.
14. Th. Malthus, p. 8/2. Hume calls. Write to Jay . Hazlit at tea. Parliament meets.
15. F. Malthus, p. 8. Fearon, fin. T Ht calls.
16. Sa. Malthus, p. 9/2. Ariosto, st. 9. Jay & Ogilvie call: Booth & Snow dine: Rosser sups.
Jan. 17. Su. Malthus, p. 11. Ariosto, st. 18.

18. M. Malthus, p. 13. Ariosto, st. 24. M calls: call on Northcote; adv. M J & S P
:
Rodd’s ; adv. Heber
.

19. Tu. Malthus, p. 15. Ariosto, st. 33. Call on Broughton
n : T Ht sups. Note from Longdil .

20. W. Malthus, p. 17/2. Ariosto, st. 56. Call on Longdil
&
J Taylor
: meet Hume : P P dines.

21. Th. Malthus, p. 17. Write to Livorno
. Hayward calls: 2 young Du Plantis dine; adv. P P
: theatre, 1/2 Brutus.
22. F. Malthus, p. 20/2. Call on Longman (see Rees ) & Irving n: Hazlit sups. P P dines.

23. Sa. Malthus, p. 21. Write to P H G . Call on Hazlit
& (for him ) Austin
: Lubé , Botwright & T T n call:
P P dines, ppc {:} theatre, 1/2 Brutus.

Jan. 24. Su. Malthus, p. 23. Ariosto, st. 81. Write to Bevan . M from Read
, & Lubé , & Ogilvie call: Rosser sups. Call on
Hayward
.

25. M. Malthus, p. 26. Ariosto, C. II, st. 14. T T , Botwt
, Hazlit , Rosser & Hayward call:
Rodd’s
.

26. Tu. Malthus, p. 27. Write to Livorno
. Ariosto, st. 41. Call on
Hume
&
Tate
.

27. W. Malthus, p. 28. Ariosto, st: 50. Call on Mackintosh
&
Lady C L ; adv. Georgius
: sup at Talfourd’s , w. Lambs, Dure, M J & W; adv. G Dyer
.

28. Th. Ariosto, st. 63. Call on Hayward
: N G at tea: Lbs sup & T Ht . Write to Taylor, Norwich
.

29. F. Malthus, p. 30/2. Call on Hayward twice , & on Longdil
.
30. Sa. Rain. Johnson’s Tour, p. 140.

Jan. 31. Su. Malthus, p. 32. Ariosto, st. 76: Johnson, p. 186, fin.
Ogilvie & Hayward call: Rosser, T & Hd Ht dine.

Feb. 1. M. Malthus, p. 34. Ariosto, C. III, st. 10. Hone , Longdil & T T call: call on
Hayward
.

2. Tu. Ariosto, st. 25.
Rodd’s
. Write to Longdil .
Trial for Damages
. Frost & snow. Giddiness.
3. W. Malthus, çala. House of Esté, p. 88. Hazlit sups.

4. Th. Malthus, p. 36/2. Call on J Taylor
: Rosser calls, ppc. Call on Lamb
n .

5. F. Malthus, p. 38. Ogilvie calls: call on Hayward
: Booth dines.

6. Sa. Malthus, p. 40/2. Write to Fairley . Oldcastle, acts 1, 2, 3.
Rodd’s
.
Feb. 7. Su. Malthus, p. 42. Ariosto, st. 40.

8. M. Malthus, p. 44, & 1 page.
N G calls: 4 Baxters dine; adv. T T & T Ht
.
9. Tu. Malthus, çala. York, act 1. Baron sups.
10. W. Malthus, 2 pp. Theatre, Evadne.

11. Th. Malthus, p. 47. Write to Livorno
. Ogilvie & Hayward call.

12. F. Malthus, p. 50. Write to Livorno
. Irving, Ogilvie, Hazlit, Hume & Booth dine; invités T T, Mulready & Baron
.

13. Sa. Malthus, p. 53/2. Recollections of Curran, çala.
Sotheby’s ; adv. Heber & White
:
Rodd’s
.

Feb. 14. Su. Malthus, p. 55/2. Ariosto, st. 60. Hayward & T T call: call on
Perry ; adv. Hill
.

15. M. Malthus, p. 58. Call on J P Collier
n &
M Lamb
: theatre, Switzerland.
Hobhouse’s Poll begins, 15 days.

16. Tu.
Jo G breakfasts: call on Booth
: N G calls:
Rodd’s
.
17. W. Smith, çala. Ogilvie calls: meet Hayward .
18. Th. Smith, çala. Write to Constable . Booth calls: dine at Snow’s , w. mrs Austin, 2 Beresfords, M J & S P .
19. F. Smith, çala. Ariosto, st. 77; C. IV, st. 13. Hayward , Otis & Blatterman call: meet H Robinson .
20. Sa. Malthus, p. 60. Ariosto, st. 26. Fearon calls.
Feb. 21. Su. Malthus, p. 62. Ariosto, st. 40. Hayward & T Rodd call: call on John Lamb , w. M J & S P .

22. M. Malthus, p. 65/2. W Curran calls n : call on H Robinson
n ,
Wallace
&
Ogilvie
: Booth at tea: theatre, Heroine; adv. Talfourd
.

23. Tu. Malthus, p. 66/2. Ariosto, st. 72.
Hayward
, Ogilvie n ; Hume & Botwright call:
Rodd’s
. T Ht sups.
24. W. Smith, çala. Ariosto, C. V, st. 13. Beresfords call: dine at Baxter’s , w. Booths, Sharp, M J, S P & W . Snow.

25. Th. Malthus, 68/2. Nash, &c. Call on Northcote ; adv. mrs Kean, mrs Cox
: T T at tea.
26. T. Malthus, p. 68. Ariosto, st. 28.
27. Sa. Ariosto, st. 38. Nash, Apologie, çala. Hayward , Tate & Botwright call: H Robinson sups.

Feb. 28. Su. Ariosto, st. 53. Nash, &c. W Curran dines; adv. H Robinson
.

Mar. 1. M. Ariosto, st. 65. Nash, &c. Call on Longdil
,
Hume
&
Hayward
: Lubé calls.
Briefs delivered .
2. Tu. Write to Mackintosh . Hayward calls, Special .
3. W. China, çala. T Ht sups.

4. Th. Call on Booth ; adv. C & R Baxter
: mrs Hamilton dines:
Coleridge , w. do & M J
: adv. Hardwick (Lambton & Bruce); speak: S Pilcher departs, 12 weeks 2 days. Seneca, Epistolæ 1, 2, 3.

5. F. China, p. 3. Write to Livorno
. Ariosto, st. 73. Call on
Hayward
.

6. Sa. China, p. 5/2. Seek Amyot : cross call, Ogilvie n : Booth dines; adv. W Curran
.

Mar. 7. M Su. Introduction, 3 1/2 pp. Robertson, America, çala. John Lamb calls: call on
Alsager
n .
8. M. Robertson, çala. Write to Fairley . T T at tea: N G . & Du Plantis call.
9. Tu. Robertson, India, çala. Ariosto, st. 92. Theatre, 3/5 Henry IV.

10. W. Robertson, çala. Macgowan calls: call on Perry
: meet J Collier :
Rodd’s ; adv. Daniel
.
11. Th. Malthus, revise. Write to C C . Ariosto, C. VI, st. 12: Traytor, acts 1, 2, 3. Botwright calls: Hazlit sups.

12. F. Malthus, revise. Traytor, fin: Hazlit, v. Gifford, pp. 87.
Macmillan calls.

13. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 25. Baron & Staveley na call: call on Sherwood
: Booth at tea: theatre, Dwarf of Naples; adv. Wallace & Surr
. Write to Rosser .
Mar. 14. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 33: Le Comte, cala. T Ht dines. Dead right little-finger.

15. M. Ariosto, st. 53. Ogilvie calls n : dine at Booth’s , w. Christy & miss Anderson; adv. mrs & miss Leechman & Edmeston
: W Curran sups.

16. Tu. Pinkerton, çala. Write to Livorno
. Staveley calls: call on
P Smith
: T Ht au soir:
Rodd’s
. Rhume, 1 week.

17. W. Ariosto, st. 61. Trick to Catch the Old One. Graham of Glasgow
, & Staveley call.
18. Th. Ariosto, st. 81. Miss Beresford & mrs Hamilton dine: T Ht sups.

19. F. Ariosto, C. VII, st. 12: Bacon, Essays, çala: More Dissemblers.
Botwright calls.
Walter Miller dies .
20. Sa. Ariosto, st. 30: Seneca, apud Crevier. Booth at tea.
Mar. 21. Su. Seneca, çala: Seneca, apud Tacitum: Tacitus, Annales, c. 8. Call on Blaetterman , w. M J : Jo. Collier calls.

22. M. Tacitus, c. 15: Seneca, De Vita Beata, c. 4. W Curran dines: Hazlit calls n :
Rodd’s ; adv. Daniel, Hone & J Richter
: meet J Hollis, 76 years.

23. Tu. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 27. Write to Livorno
. Hor. Smith calls: call on Knowles
:
Lowndes’s
.
Kotzebue dies .

24. W. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 35. Write to Constable : call on Knowles ; adv. Wilson
: P Smith calls.

25. Th. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 45. Southwark Bridge, w. M J & W .
Townsend, W Herald, dies
26. F. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 54. Seek Ogilvie : mt Hayward : T Ht sups.

27. Sa. Malthus, revise. Write to Fairley . Tacitus, c. 63. Booth dines: call on
Hayward
.
Mar. 28. Su. Malthus, Sparta, çala. Tacitus, c. 69. Meet T Hill .

29. M. Malthus, Anacharsis, çala. Tacitus, c. 75. Call on Longdil
: Jo G dines; adv. Botwright
: N G calls: Coleridge ; adv. H Richter & Wirgman (speak) : Hazlit sups.

30. Tu. Tacitus, c. 81. Call on Booth ; adv. John Miller
:
Rodd’s ; adv. Daniel
. meet Phillips .
31. W. Malthus, Sparta, çala. Tacitus, L. II, c. 11. Johnstone (Stanmore), Botwright & N G call.

Apr. 1. Th. Museum, Sparta & Peru; adv. Planta
. Tacitus, c. 22. W Curran sups. Summer, 3 days.

2. F. Museum, Herrera, &c.
Write to Dr Rees . Tacitus, c. 32. Plutarch, Lysander. Botwright sups.
3. Sa. Malthus, Sparta. Write to Sherwood . Ogilvie , John Miller , Lackington & Booth call: theatre, Italians.

Apr. 4. Su. Malthus, Aristotle, çala. Tacitus, c. 42. 3 Du Plantis’s dine; adv. mrs Hamilton & Ogilvie
: call on Alsager
.

5. M. Malthus, Sparta. Tickner , Irving & Ogilvie call: meet Booth & R Br
:
Rodd’s
: Lambs sup.

6. Tu. Malthus, Thucydides. Ilberry, from Colburn , calls; & Lube n : call on Knowles
&
Hume , w.M J : Booth at tea.
7. W. Robertson, America, p. 65 to 237. Hazlit sups.

8. Th. Robertson, çala. Ogilvie & Botwright call: tea
Alsager’s , w. Lambs, Ayrton, capt. Burney, Colson, M J & W.
9. F. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Tickner, Irving & W Curran dine.

10. Sa. Malthus, 1/2 page. Voltaire & Montaigne. Booth at tea.
Smart’s Readings, Lear, w. M J; adv. O’Brien
. meet Jesse Foote . call on Taylor, Norwich ; adv. R & A
.
Apr. 11. Su. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Robertson & Raynal, çala .

12. M. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. T & Harwood Ht dine; invités Hy Ht & John May
:
Rodd’s
.
13. Tu. Malthus, 1/2 page. M & T Ht call: seek Plumptre : Staveley au soir. N G calls & W Wallace na .

14. W. Robertson, çala. Cundel, from Ewbanke , calls: call on Plumptre
: Booth at tea.

15. Th. Malthus, 2 pp. Write to Bevan . Mercier & Harwood Ht call:
Matthews at Home, w. W
.

16. F. Malthus, 2 pp. T T , T Ht , Botwright & Ticknor call: Jo G dines; adv. N G
: W Curran sups.

17. Sa. Malthus, pp. 1 1/2. T Ht & Ogilvie call: call on Plumptre
: theatre, Heart of Mid Lothian.

Apr. 18, Su. Malthus, 1 page. T Ht calls: Blaettermans dine; adv. Ogilvie
.

19. M. Malthus, 1 page. Write to P H G . Dr Watson calls:
theatre, Honour.

20. Tu. Malthus, çala. Call on Booth ; adv. C & R B
: Ogilvie &
Preston call n : Lambs sup.
21. W. The. Cibber, Life, passim. Hazlit au soir.

22. Th. The. Cibber, çala. Irving & Ticknor call n : Delacourt, fr. Johnstone
.

23. F. Barrow, China, çala. Write to Rosser . Tacitus, c. 52. Ticknor & P Nicholson call.
Christopher Savile dies .

24. Sa. Ellis, China, çala. Tacitus, c. 55. Write to Ticknor . W C &
Blaetterman call: Booth at tea; adv. Hayward
.
Apr. 25. Su. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 67. W C , Mcready & Ogilvie call.

26. M. Robertson, India. Write to Constable & C Wilkins . Tacitus, c. 81. // Call on Dr Watson
. W To P Nicholson .

27. Tu. Tacitus, c. 88. Seek Mackintosh, Holland House
: British Gallery; adv. Wilkie
.

28. W. Tacitus, çala: Life of Curran, çala. Call on Mackintosh, D C ; adv. R Taylor
: Booth at tea; adv. N G
.
29. Th. Malthus, pp. 3. Tacitus, Lib. III, c. 13. Botwright , Snow & M Jones call.
30. F. Malthus, p. 6. Tacitus, c. 21. Theatre, Henry IV, fin. Owen calls n .

May 1. Sa. Malthus, p. 5, 6. Tacitus, c. 27. Call on Ackerman
: Turnerelli calls n : Booth dines. meet Reynolds .

May 2. Su. Malthus, p. 9/2. Tacitus, c. 30. T Ht dines; adv. Baron
.

3. M. Life of Curran. Menace from Constable
. Exhibition; adv. J C Banks
: theatre, Wanted a Wife. Catholic Question, 241 to 243.
4. Tu. Malthus, revise. Expect Booth . Lotteries, 133 to 84.

5. W. Write to Constable . Call on Colebrooke ; adv. Dr Wilkins
: Booth dines.
Scott Waring dies .

6. Th. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. P S to Constable . Ogilvie , Wirgman & Owen call:
Rodd’s
. Scottish Burghs, 149 to 144.

7. F. Malthus, 1 pages. Wake calls: call on
Hayward
.

8. Sa. The. Cibber, bis, Call on Hayward
.
May 9. Su. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 34. Fall down stairs.
10. M. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 36. Hazlit , Delacourt & Rosser call: sup at Lamb’s , w. M Burney, M J & W .
11. Tu. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 42. Rosser sups.

12. W. Malthus, revise. Tacitus, c. 46. Call on Amyot
&
Northcote
: theatre, Fredolfo; adv. Wallace
.

13. Th. Write to Goulburn . Call on L C Lamb
: mrs Stokes dines; adv. Rosser & Booth
: theatre, Carib Chief; adv. Wallace & Orme
.

14. F. Write to Napoli
. Tacitus, c. 53; Agricola, çala. Call on Irving
n : walk w. Rosser .

15. Sa. Tacitus, c. 57. Macgowan , Johnstone & R Baxter call: theatre, Roland for an Oliver; adv. Wallace
{.}
May 16. Su. Suetonius, Burton , Montaigne, çala. Rosser calls.

17. M. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Rosser & Jo G call: H Robinson sups:
Rodd’s
.

18. Tu. Life of Sanderson, pp. 198. Mrs Beresford & son dine:
A Lamb & Dr Leigh at tea: mrs Beresford sleeps.
19. W. Malthus, 1 page. T Ht sups.
20. Th. Sparta, çala. Life of Boyle, çala.
21. F. Malthus, 2 pp. (Sparta.) Life of Boyle, fin. Ogilvie & Lubé call: W for Addlestone, 4 nights.
22. Sa. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. VII, st. 25. Dine at Aldis’s , w. Bignold, Wilson, Willis & Bourdilier .

May 23. Su. Roman Census, çala. Ariosto, st. 40.
Six Books .

24. M. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Theatre, Tancred, & Cousening; adv. Fuseli, Knowles & O Brien
.

25. Tu. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 60. T Ht & Otis na call:
Rodd’s
.

26. W. Malthus, 1 page. Write to Bevan . Ariosto, st. 80. Botwright calls: meet H Robinson : Booth at tea. Call on
Davison
n .

27. Th. Malthus, 3 pp. Ariosto, C. VIII, st. 15. Macmillan calls: call on L C Lamb
n .
28. F. Write to P H Godwin . Rubens Exhibition, Antwerp . Ariosto, st. 34. Burlington Arcade .

29. Sa. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 52. Call on Sherwd
: Booth, avant & après diner (Sussmilch). Mark, 2 nights.

May 30. Su. Malthus, 3 pp. Ariosto, st. 66. Call on Aspinwal
.

31. M. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 91. Wallace , Macready & Beresford call: call on
H Robinson
: meet Lamb : 3 Hts & J May dine: Botwright au soir:
Rodd’s
.

June 1. Tu. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, iterum: Lodge, Marius & Sylla, act 1, 2, 3. Call on Booth
: Irving na , E Taylor & Owen call.

2. W. Malthus, 1 page; Paraguay, çala. Ariosto, C. IX, st. 18.
Botwright & mrs Napier call: Rubens, w. M J . Lax.

3. Th. Malthus, 3 pp. Ariosto, st. 40. Underwood dines; adv. Botwright
: T Ht sups.
4. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 56. motto .
5. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 70. Ogilvie calls na : Booth, soirée.
June 6. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 94. Meet Amyot : Baron sups.
7. M. Ariosto, C. X, st. 12. Ogilvie , Hazlit , Hume , Booth , N G & Wigg call (Shipdam). William, nepos , dies .

8. Tu. Aris Malthus, 10 lines. Ariosto, st. 30. British Gallery, w. M J, & Harlow’s
:
Rodd’s
. Bireno.
9. W. Malthus, revise{.} Write to W Curran . Ariosto, st. 48. 1 1/2 day.

10. Th. Write to Napoli
. Ariosto, st. 59: Surrey by Nott, çala. Hazlit calls.

11. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 89: Surrey, çala. Call on Taylor
&
H
: Ogilvie calls, & Rosser .

12. Sa. Malthus, revise; End of Book I. Ariosto, st. 115. Call on Hessey
.
June 13. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XI, st. 20: Surrey, çala. Hazlit calls.

14. M. Ariosto, st. 36: Davie, Paraguay, p. 200. Call on Northcote
: ad
Booth , Rosser & T Ht na call.
15. Tu. Malthus, revise. 2pp. Ariosto, st. 48: Paraguay, fin. Meet R P : Rosser sups.

16. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 72. Waggoner. Call on L C Lamb
n ,
M Lamb
&
J Taylor
:
Rodd’s
. meet H Robinson .

17. Th. Malthus, revise. South America, çala. Call on T Ht
: Plumptre na & Botwright call, & C Baxter n .

18. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 82; C. XII, st. 30. Call on Plumptre
, &
col. Harwood
: T Ht calls: Snow sups.

19. Sa. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 50. Call on Long, broker
, &
Dibbin
: Ogilvie calls: sup at Hazlit’s , w. do
. C Lloyd calls n .

June 20. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 66. Dine at Phillips’s , w. Surrs; adv. W
.

21. M. Malthus, revise (average). Ariosto, st. 82. Call on C Lloyd
n : Booth at tea (retracts): meet Theobald jr
:
Rodd’s
. Call on Hayward
.
22. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 94. Write to Ogilvie, on self-love . Ogilvie & Botwright call.
23. W. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp(America.). Ariosto, C. XIII, st. 20. Write to Eastwick . Jo G calls: call on Bignold , w. Aldis .
24. Th. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 36. Rosser & T Ht call, & R Baxter .

25. F. Malthus, B. III, p. 2. Ariosto, st. 43. Ogilvie calls{:} call on C Lloyd
n : Hazlit sups.

26. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 58. Letter of nepos
. Botwright at tea.

June 27. Su. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. (Migration.) Ariosto, st. 83. Dine at Aldis’s , w. Wageman’s & Woodham; adv. T Ht
. Depression.

28. M. Ariosto, C. XIV, st. 9. Call on
Knowles
,
Pollexfen
&
Hume
: mrs Hamilton dines; adv. Ogilvie
: Booth at tea; adv. Botwright
.

29. Tu. Malthus, revise (animate). Write to Livorno
. Snow na , R B & Ogilvie call: Rosser at tea. Ariosto, st. 30. Meet A Boswel .
30. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 53. Jo & N G dine. M calls.
July 1. Th. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 74. Botwright at tea. Write to Pearson . Robertson, North America, çala.

2. F. Robertson, fin. Knowles & Pollexfen dine: H Robinson sups. invités Irving & C Lloyd
.
3. Sa. Chalmers, United Colonies, çala. Bride of Lammermoor, p. 81. Wageman calls.

July 4. Su. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Lammermoor, p. 224. Dine at Hume’s , w. Minn & W; adv. Anderson
. Ariosto, st. 90.
5. M. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 111: Lammermoor, p. 270. Ogilvie & Eastwick call: T H sups. Hints for a new // Introduction.

6. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 122: Lammermoor, p. 333. Lambs // sup & H Robinson; adv. Booth ; invité Lloyd
.

7. W. Malthus, 12 lines. Write to Taylor, Norwich
, & P H G . Ariosto, st. 134: Lammermoor, Vol. II, p. 122. Wageman na .
8. Th. Malthus, Introduction, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, C. XV, st. 12: Lammermoor, p. 324. Ogilvie calls, & Botwright .

9. F. Malthus, Introduction, p. 4/2. Ariosto, st. 28. Rosser calls: dine at
Ogilvie’s (Sparrow’s), w. 2 Branscombs .
10. Sa. Ariosto, st. 46: Lammermoor. Vol. III, p. 194. Booth & P Nicholson call.
July 11. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 66: Lammermoor, p. 333. Ogilvie calls.

12. M. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 87: Lammermoor, Vol. IV, p. 194.
May & H Ht dine; adv. Snow
: Botwrt calls: Pollexfen sups.

13. Tu. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 105. T Ht calls: call on Theobald
&
S Miller
: mrs Hamilton sups. Prorogation.

14. W. Ariosto, C. XVI, st. 18: Lammermoor, p. 330, fin. Call on Booth
.
15. Th. Malthus, çala; 1 page. Ariosto, st. 45. Hume & Botwright calls: Mulready sups not.

16. F. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 57. Eastwick calls:
Rosser tea & sups . Call on Galloway
. &
Hayward
.

17. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 89: Rel. Courtship, p. 38.
Ogilvie calls: call on F Walsh, Custom House
. Booth calls n .
July 18. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. XVII, st. 21: R Courtship, p. 68. Sup at Lloyd’s , w. Stokes, S Hazlit & Grosvenor L .

19. M. Ariosto, st. 43: R C, p. 158. Hazlit , T T & T Ht call:
Rodd’s
.

20. Tu. Malthus, revise. Write to M Burney , Ariosto, st. 64: Plutarch, Treatise I: R C, p. 196. Call on F Walsh
: meet W Morgan .
Playfair dies .
21. W. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 85. T T calls: Booth at tea.

22. Th. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 113. Lambs & Hazlit & son sup; invités C Lloyd & Alsager
: Rosser calls; proxy to Amyot . Fire, Cow Lane .
23. F. Malthus, 2 pp. Don Juan, by L B. Richardson of Liverpool , Ogilvie , Brodie , M Lamb & T Ht call.
24. Sa. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 135. Richardson of L , Hall , & R Baxter , & T T call: Booth sups. T Ht to Rickman .
July 25. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. XVIII, st. 16. G Brodie, Ogilvie & T Ht dine.

26. M. Ariosto, st. 28. Call on Booth
: Richardson of L calls .

27. Tu.
Greenwich, w. Mulready, E Collins, M J, W & M V .

28. W. Ariosto, st. 43. Museum, Petty; adv. Brodie
: call on Lamb ; adv. Coleridge
.

29. Th. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 59. Call on Amyot
n : meet Boaden : Rosser calls: T Ht sups.
Rodd’s
. Macgowan calls. walk .
30. F. Malthus, 1 page; revise. Ariosto, st. 83. Botwright at tea: Baron sups. Write to M W S .
31. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 100. Botwright at tea: Booth au soir.

Aug. 1. Su. Malthus, 4 pp (Euler & ratio). Ariosto, st. 131: Plutarch, Treatise II.
Baron sups.

2. M. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 141. Mrs Fletcher of Edinburgh
na , Eastwick , Botwright & Brodie call: call on Lloyd
n .

3. Tu. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 158. Macgowan calls{:} call on mrs Fletcher
. Give copy.
4. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 192. Kensington, w. M J, mrs Hamilton & E Collins .

5. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XIX, st. 20: Gitanella. 3 Fletchers & Owen call: Botwright at tea: call on Hayward
. Mazeppa.
6. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 40. Ogilvie , Rosser & Macgowan call: T Ht sups.

7. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 46 56: Peter’s Letters, çala. Booth at tea; adv. Botwright
: Macgowan calls.
Aug. 8. Su. Malthus, 1 page; revise. Ariosto, st. 70. Dine at Knowles’s , w. 2 Freemans, Röntgen, M J & W .

9. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 89. Call on Davison
: Ogilvie calls:
Rodd’s
, & 55, Strand : Brodie sups. Snow calls, & C Lloyd n .

10. Tu. Ariosto, st. 108. Call on Davison
,
Macmillan
n , &
Hayward
: Booth calls n .

11. W. Ariosto, C. XX, st. 13. Call on
Hume
& Macmillan : Booth dines.

12. Th. Malthus, 1 page. Ariosto, st. 33: Grounds, p. 60.
Rodd’s
, & 55 : Ogilvie calls, & Botwright .
13. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 53. Macgowan , Boyle , Botwright & T Ht call: Rosser walk: Ogilvie & Brodie at tea: après Baron .
14. Sa. Malthus, revise; end of Book I. Arioto, bis.

Aug. 15. Su. Ariosto, bis: Clarenstein, Vol. I. Call on Booth (ratios) &
Phillips
n .
16. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 73: Clarenstein, Vol. II, p. 126. Ogilvie calls. Outrage at Manchester .

17. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 93: Clarenstein, p. 342.
Hazlit & Brodie call: call on Hume
: mt R Taylor & Botwright : Booth au soir.
18. W. Malthus, 3 pp. Ariosto, st. 123. Hazlit calls: Brodie & Hazlit sup.

19. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 144: Clarenstein, Vol. III. Call on Ogilvie
n : Rosser & Booth call.
20. F. Malthus, 1 page; revise. Irving & Ogilvie call: Ariosto, C. XXI, st. 20. T Ht sups.

21. Sa. Ariosto, st. 33. Steamboat to Southend, w. M J, R & A Taylor, Hall Packer & Leece : call on M
.
Aug. 22. Su. Call on Snow , w. M : tea Snow’s , w. M J : call on miss Smith , w. M J : Taylors call n . Hazlit, Pol. Essays.
23. M. Steamboat to London, w. M, R & A Taylor, & Leece : Booth au soir.
24. Tu. Hazlit, çala: Write to Booth, on Euler .
25. W. Malthus, revise. Write to M J . Baxter dines: T Ht calls. Ariosto, st. 45: Peter’s Letters, p. 132.

26. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 60: Peter, p. 333. Call on M Burney
n : Booth dines; adv. Rosser
: Brodie au soir. meet O’Brien & T Moore .

27. F. Malthus, 3 pp, Euler. Write to M W S . Ariosto, st. 72. Ogilvie , Rosser call:
Rodd’s
: Snow sups.
28. Sa. Malthus, 2 pp. Write to M J . Ariosto, C. XXII, st. 23. Rosser calls: theatre, Pigeons & Crows.
Aug. 29. Su. Malthus, Table, &c. Ariosto, st. 31: Knickerbocker, p. 140.
30. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 50. Botwright calls. rain.

31. Tu. Invent, before rising. Peter, Vol. III. Ogilvie & Brodie sup; adv. Galt
: Brodie au matin. Write to M J .
Sep. 1. W. Paragraph on Blackstone. Botwright au soir.

2. Th. Malthus, revise; end of Book II, Chap. II. Ogilvie & Brodie (ppc) call: call on
T Rodd
. W for South End .
3. F. Write to Mackintosh . Ariosto, st. 65. Ogilvie , Sweetman , Rosser & Baxter na call. Plutarch, Treatse III.
4. Sa. Ariosto, st. 78. Steamboat to Southend. Lamb calls n .
Sep. 5. Su. Ride to Prittlewel, Drive.
6. M. Steamboat to London, w. C Heath & wife, & W .

7. Tu. Call on Booth
, &
Lamb
n :
Lowndes’s
.

8. W. Malthus, 2 pp. Write to M J . Ariosto, st. 98. Call on
Knowles ; adv. C Bonnycastle
: Ogilvie calls: meet T Rodd & Hayward : theatre, 1/2 School for Scandal.
9. Th. Malthus, 1 page. Write to M W S . Ariosto, C. XXIII, st. 18. M dines.

10. F. Malthus, 1/2 page. Ariosto, st. 41. Macgowan calls: call on M Lamb
: meet mrs Hamilton : Rodds sup. Botwright calls.
11. Sa. Malthus, revise. Write to M J . Ariosto, st. 73. Booth dines. W examined by C Bonnycastle .

Sep. 12. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 91: Plutarch, Treatise IV.
Rosser twice .

13. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 113: Plutarch, Treatise LXVII.
T Ht sups; adv. Botwright
. Walk w. Rosser .

14. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 136: Sketch Book. Macgowan & Ogilvie call: M dines; adv N G
: Baron sups.
15. W. Write to M J . Ariosto, C. XXIV, st. 12. W Curran calls: theatre, Deserted Daughter. Stop the press.

16. Th. Malthus, 1/2 page. Ariosto, st. 32. Call on Booth
: Ogilvie & Botwright call.
17. F. Malthus, calculate. Ariosto, st. 52. Booth & M dine: M J from Southend . ( humeur )

18. Sa. Malthus, medite. Ariosto, st. 77. Call on Booth ; adv. Curtis
: Landseer & W Curran n call: Mathematical Society, w. Booth & R Baxter; Curtshen .
Sep. 19. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 96. Curtshen calls: W Curran dines.

20. M. Malthus, 1 page. Ariosto, st. 115. Dixon & M Lamb call, & T Ht n : call on Knowles
&
Bonnycastle ; adv. Jas Moore
: Rosser au soir.

21. Tu. Ariosto, C. XXV, st. 21. R Baxter & Curnin & M Jones call: Booth’s au soir; adv. 3 Baxters
: Rosser sups.
22. W. Malthus, calculate. Ariosto, st. 41. Curnin , Ogilvie & Macmillan call:

Botwright at tea: theatre; adv. Wallace
.

23. Th. Malthus, 4 pp. Ariosto, st. 61. Macgowan calls: call on T Rodd, chez
Richards
.
24. F. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 80. R Baxter calls: Lambs & Snow sup.

25. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 97: Kaimes, on Delusion, pp. 68. Call on Ogilvie
:
Rodd’s
.
Sep. 26. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XXVI, st. 25: Plutarch, Treatise V, VI.
27. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 50: Plutarch, Treatise VII/2. R Baxter calls: Booth dines not.
28. Tu. Wargentin, seek. Ariosto, st. 81. C Lloyd calls: R Baxter at tea: T Ht sups.
29. W. Museum, Wargentin . Ariosto, st. 109. Booth calls n & W Curran .

30. Th. Malthus, revise.
R Society , Wargentin . Ariosto st. 137. Rosser calls: call on Knowles
&
C Bonnycastle
.

Oct. 1. F. Malthus, 1 page. Ariosto, C. XXVII, st. 25.
R Society , Wargentin . Theatre, 1/2 Othello; adv. J Taylor & Wallace
.
2. Sa. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 53. Booth dines: Hume calls n .

Oct. 3. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 70. W Curran dines: call on La. Phillips ; adv. Surrs
.

4. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 95. Write to P Nicholson , & Mackintosh for Booth
:
R Society , Wargentin . R Baxter calls: theatre, 1/5 Wild Oats; adv. Aldis
.

5. Tu. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Seek Ryberg (Swede) : call on Baber
&
Hayward
: Booth at tea. Ariosto, st. 121: H Tooke, Trial for Debt, pp. 85.

6. W. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 140; C. XXVIII, st. 12. Call on Tottie
, &
Wahlen (Swedish Chaplain)
: Booth at tea; adv. Rosser
.

7. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 27. Write to Curtis & Pouncy .
R Society , Wargentin . Sup at Lloyd’s , w. mrs Lloyd & Stokes .

8. F. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 253. Macgowan & M call: call on
Hume
,
Hayward
, &
T Rodd ; adv. W Lowndes
: T Ht sups: Talfourd calls.

9. Sa. Malthus, 2 pp. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Ariosto, st. 70. Call on Devey
: Snows na & Botwright call.
Oct. 10. Su. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 102. T Ht calls (lecture on Rickman ): Rosser at tea.
11. M. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, C. XXIX, st. 25. Theatre, 1/2 Henry IV, pt I. R Taylor , Macmillan & Rosser call.

12. Tu. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 57. Hayward , M & Mackintosh call: call on Knowles
,
C Bonnycastle
&
Denley
: Snow sups.
13. W. Ariosto, st. 74. Museum, Wargentin . Hayward & Ogilvie call: theatre, 1/2 Love for Love.

14. Th. Instructions for Scarlet, 5 pp. Ariosto, C. XXX, st. 25. Call on Hume
: meet Perry & S Miller :
Rosser, tea & sups . Hayward calls.
15. F. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Write to M W S . Ariosto, st. 46. T Ht & W Curran na call, & Hayward twice; Consultation .
16. Sa. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 75. Macmillan , W Curran , Hume & Hayward call: Booth at tea: Hazlit sups.

Oct. 17. Su. Ariosto, st. 95. Call on Scarlet
&
Hayward
.

18. M. Ariosto, C. XXXI, st. 27. Guildhall; meet Hayward . Booth dines; adv. Hayward
: Lubé au soir: theatre, 1/5 Alexander. Trial in ejectment:

19. Tu. Ariosto, st. 53. T T calls: call, w. him, on Haywd
.

20. W. Ariosto, st. 77. Call on Booth
: theatre, Fisherman’s Hut; adv. Boaden
. Botwright calls.

21. Th. Malthus, revise. Write to Mackintosh . Ariosto, st. 110. M & Botwright call: call on Hayward
.
22. F. Write toM W S . Ariosto, C. XXXII, st. 21. Jo G calls: theatre, 1/4 Rob Roy. Deep snow.
23. Sa. Ariosto, st. 41. Jo G breakfasts: Philipses call: Mulready dines.
Oct. 24. Su. Ariosto, st. 61. Rousseau, Confessions, V. I & II, read in this & the preceding weeks.

25. M. Ariosto, st. 80. Botwright calls: C & R Baxter dine; adv. Booth
.

26. Tu. Malthus, 3 pp. Ariosto, st. 110. M & Johnstone call: call on P Nicholson
.
27. W. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. XXXIII, st. 25: Age of Reason, çala. Sternutation.

28. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 50. R Baxter calls: call on Hume
, &
Lee
R Soc : theatre, Richard III.

29. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 70. Call on T Rodd
n : R Taylor calls: T Ht sups.

30. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 95. Call on Ogilvie
.
Oct. 31. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 128: Plutarch, Treatise, VII, fin. Hazlit sups.

Nov. 1. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XXXIV, st. 25. Call on H Robinson
: Booth dines; Swedish argumt
.

2. Tu. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 41. Call on Keir
: theatre, Road to Ruin. Johnstone & Burton call.

3. W. Ariosto, st. 55. Call on Booth
: Botwright at tea.

4. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 72. Call on T Rodd
n .

5. F. Malthus, beginning of Book II, Chap. IV. Ariosto, st. 92.
Hazlit, Lecture, w. M J, W & C B; adv. C Philips & Hill
: C B sleeps, 3 nights.
6. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XXXV, st. 25. Botwright calls.

Nov. 7. Su. Ariosto, st. 46. Call on Booth ; adv. 2 Baxters
: 5 Baxters dine; adv. Mulready
. T T calls. Swedish argument improved.

8. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 80. Call on Irving
n : Botwright at tea:
Keir tea & supper : theatre, 1/4 Richard III (Kean). C & R Baxter dine.
9. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XXXVI, st. 21. Hazlit & T Ht sup. Botwright calls.
10. W. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 36. T Rodd calls na : theatre, Confederacy.
11. Th. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 68. T Rodd & C Mercier call.

12. F. Malthus, 1 1/2 pp. Ariosto, st. 84. Keir , Ogilvie & Mulready call: Hazlit; adv. Lambs, H Robinson, Aldises & Hill
: Ogilvie sups.
13. Sa. Malthus, 2 1/2 pp. Ariosto, C. XXXVII, st. 23. Irving calls.
Nov. 14. Su. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 41. Mulready calls.

15. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 63: Plutarch, Treatise VIII:
Lubé & Snow call n .

16. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 92: Plutarch, Treatise IX. Keir at tea: H Robinson sups; invités Lambs & Alsager
.
17. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 122: Hamlet, act 1/2. M calls.

18. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XXXVIII, st. 21. Northcote calls: W Irving & Mulready dine; adv. H Snow
.
19. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 41. Hume calls: theatre, Short Reign.
20. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 66. Booth at tea: Hazlit sups.

Nov. 21. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 90. Rosser calls: call on R P , w. M J : tea Snow’s , w. do
.
22. M. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. XXXIX, st. 25. M calls: Rosser sups: N G calls. Begin Horace, avant diner .
23. Tu. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, st. 55. Call on Smirke n: meet Northcote : Botwright at tea: Lambs, Alsager & H Robinson sup. Parliament meets.

24. W. Ariosto, st. 83. Macmillan & Rosser call: call on Creswick
: Fairley at tea. Brutus played Nov. 19, 20, 24: Brutus, & Jaffier, announced (Nov. 22) for 27, interdicted.

25. Th. Ariosto, C. XL, st. 30. Call on
Booth
: meet T T : Snows sup: Botwright calls.
26. F. Malthus, revise. Write to P B S . Ariosto, st. 55. Hayward calls: Fairley & R B at tea ( Hazlit’s ).

27. Sa. Ariosto, st. 82. Call on Smirke
&
Northcote
:
T Rodd’s
. (en belle maniere.
Nov. 28. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XLI, st. 25. Booths, Fairley & Hayward dine.
29. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 50. R Baxter calls: call on Sherwood : theatre, Ric. III, acts 3, 4, 5. Write to Pouncy .

30. Tu. Malthus, revise. Write to Rennie . Ariosto, st. 75. Write to M W S . Call on Wahlen
.
Dec. 1. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 102. Meet T T : M calls, & Fairley n .
2. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XLII, st. 25. Sup at Snow’s , w. M J & W .

3. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 50. Bolmann calls: call on Tottie
: Mulready dines; adv. Springsguth
.

4. Sa. Malthus, revise. Seek Botwright : call on Lamb ; adv. mrs Morgan
: Botwright & R Taylor call: Fairley & Booth : meet Mulready : seek H Robinson .

Dec. 5. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 66. Call on Peacock
n &
Aldis
.
6. M. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 104. R Baxter calls: seek Maclead : Fairley dines. Torpor of Left hand.

7. Tu. Call on Rennie
& Peacock : Fairley at tea:
Rodd’s ; adv. Hone
.

8. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, C. XLIII, st. 20. Call on T T, w. M J; adv. M Lamb
: theatre, 3/10 Macbeth; adv. Wake
{:} Booth calls n .
9. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 35. M calls: T Rodd . Give copy.
10. F. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 61. Eastwick , Aldis , R Taylor & N G calls: meet H Robinson : T Ht sups.
11. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 90. Lloyd , Baxter & Fairley call: Booth at tea.

Dec. 12. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 110. Dine at Aldis’s , w. mrs Farren; adv. Hazlit
.
13. M. Malthus, revise, & p. Ariosto, st. 122. A Taylor & 3 Turners n call: Mulready dines: theatre, Comedy of Errors.

14. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 144. Macgowan calls: call on Hayward
: theatre, Mary Stuart.

15. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 170. Macgowan & Botwright call: sup at
Lloyd’s , w. Bancart .

16. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 199. Seek Curtis : call on Macgowan
: Owen & Botwright n call. Red hot pipe.

17. F. Malthus, revise. Write, express, to Curtis, Camberwel
. Ariosto, C. XLIV, st. 29.
18. Sa. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 60. Seek Maclead : Botwright calls.
Dec. 19. Su. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 84. Isabel, by C Lloyd, fin.

20. M. Ariosto, st. 104: Levite d’Ephraim, & Reine Fantasque. Bt & M call: call on
Macgowan
: Booth & Lubé at tea.

21. Tu. Head-ache. Rousseau, Confessions, Tom. IV, fin. Booth dines: call, w. him, on Macgowan
n : au soir, Macgowan & McDermot, to Booth .
22. W. Rousseau, çala. T T & Watts call: call on Brown , Linnean, w. T T : Booth at tea.

23. Th. Malthus, 9 lines. Ariosto, C. XLV, st. 30. Vestry; adv. Waithman & sir R Phillips
: call on Nairman (sir J Banks); adv. Brown & Johnson
:
T Rodd’s
: Keir sups.

24. F. Malthus, revise. Swedish Transactions, S J Bs .
Hazlit, Lecture, w. Bt & W; adv. Hazlit, mrs J Ht , & Talfourd
: sup at Botwright’s , w. W . Lloyd calls n .

25. Sa. Malthus, revise. Hd & Hy Ht dine; adv. Arroway
: dine at Hume’s , w. Listons, T T, mrs Boinville, Caunter, Bunnet, M J & W . Hy Ht sleeps, 4 nights.

Su. J Dec. 26. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 46. Call on Booth
: C Baxter & Hd Ht dine.

27. M. Malthus. Ariosto, st. 62.
Sir J B’s ; adv. Lee & Brown
: Mulready calls: T Ht dines.

28. Tu. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 77: Travels to the Missouri, p. 30.
Sir J B’s ; Nairman .

29. W. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 100.
Sir J B’s ; Nairman .
30. Th. Malthus, revise. Ariosto, st. 117.

31. F. Malthus, 2 pp. Ariosto, C. XLVI, st. 25: Watson, Apology for the Bible, fin. Scald.
E Hamond dies .
